summary: TCA Architecture Documentation and Flow Mapping

content.text:
<ide_selection>The user selected the lines 78 to 96 from /Users/marcinjucha/Scandit/digital-shelf-ios/worktree-feature/DigitalShelf/Screens/ShelfScan/Common/ModuleList/AisleModuleListView.swift:
    func row(module: PersistedShelfScanModule) -> some View {
        HStack {
            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 2) {
                Text(module.reference)
                    .foregroundStyle(Colors.neutral90)
                if let description = moduleDescriptionFor(module, store.aisle) {
                    Text(description)
                        .font(Constants.Fonts.shelfAisleDetail)
                        .foregroundColor(Colors.Svm.aisleListGrey.swiftUIColor)
                }
            }
            .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)

            if shouldShowCheckmarkFor(module, store.aisle) {
                Images.checkmark.swiftui
                    .foregroundStyle(Colors.brandGreen100)
            }
        }
    }

This may or may not be related to the current task.</ide_selection>

Potrzebuję zaktualizować AisleModuleList oraz możliwe że @DigitalShelf/Screens/ShelfScan/Common/ModuleList/AisleModuleListFeature.swift aby mieć możliwość dodania nowego **Accessibility View**, czyli tej ikonki po prawej stronie. Pomóż mi to zaplanować, jak to zrobić, bo sprawdź również miejsca, w których ten widok jest użyty, a jest ich kilka.
Pomogę Ci zaplanować dodanie nowego Accessibility View (ikony) do AisleModuleList. Pozwól, że najpierw przeanalizuję, gdzie ten widok jest używany i jak jest zbudowany.

content.content:
1→// Copyright © 2024 Scandit. All rights reserved.
     2→
     3→import ComposableArchitecture
     4→import Dependencies
     5→import Introspect
     6→import SwiftUI
     7→
     8→extension NavigationDestination {
     9→    static let slowFlowRootView = Self(name: "OnboardingFlowRootView")
    10→}
    11→
    12→struct OnboardingFlowRootView: View {
    13→    @Dependency(\.homeNavigation)
    14→    var navigation
    15→
    16→    let store: TCAStoreOf<OnboardingFlowRootViewStore>
    17→
    18→    @Dependency(\.aisleService)
    19→    var aisleService
    20→
    21→    let storeId: Int
    22→
    23→    let storeName: String
    24→
    25→    init(
    26→        store: Store,
    27→        licenseKey: String?,
    28→        settings: OnboardingFlowSettings,
    29→        exportOptions: ShelfScanCaptureExportOptions
    30→    ) {
    31→        self.storeId = store.id
    32→        self.storeName = store.name
    33→        self.store = ComposableArchitecture.Store(
    34→            initialState: OnboardingFlowRootViewStore.State(store: store)
    35→        ) {
    36→            OnboardingFlowRootViewStore(
    37→                licenseKey: licenseKey,
    38→                settings: settings,
    39→                exportOptions: exportOptions,
    40→                store: store
    41→            )
    42→        }
    43→    }
    44→
    45→    var body: some View {
    46→        AisleListView(
    47→            store: store.scope(state: \.aisleList, action: \.aisleList)
    48→        )
    49→        .onAppear {
    50→            navigation.tagLast(destination: .slowFlowRootView)
    51→            store.send(.onAppear)
    52→        }
    53→        .navigationDestination(for: NavigationDestination.self) { destination in
    54→            switch destination {
    55→            case .aisleModuleListView:
    56→                // NOTE: Logic doesn't belong into view. Module list needs refactoring
    57→                // to support multiple styles.
    58→                store.optionalScope(
    59→                    state: \.moduleList,
    60→                    action: \.moduleList,
    61→                    view: AisleModuleListView.create(
    62→                        moduleDescriptionFor: { module, aisle in
    63→                            aisleService
    64→                                .localUpdateDate(
    65→                                    forModule: ModuleIdentity(
    66→                                        aisle: aisle,
    67→                                        moduleId: module.id,
    68→                                        moduleReference: module.reference
    69→                                    ),
    70→                                    ofSessionTypes: .onboardingFlow
    71→                                )?
    72→                                .lastScannedDescription
    73→                        },
    74→                        shouldShowCheckmarkFor: { module, aisle in
    75→                            @Dependency(\.settingsManager)
    76→                            var manager
    77→
    78→                            return aisleService
    79→                                .localUpdateDate(
    80→                                    forModule: ModuleIdentity(
    81→                                        aisle: aisle,
    82→                                        moduleId: module.id,
    83→                                        moduleReference: module.reference
    84→                                    ),
    85→                                    ofSessionTypes: .onboardingFlow
    86→                                ).flatMap {
    87→                                    $0.timeIntervalSinceNow < manager.checkmarkCompletionOnboardingPeriod
    88→                                } ?? false
    89→                        }
    90→                    )
    91→                )
    92→                .scanditNavigationBar()
    93→            case .selectedModuleView:
    94→                store.optionalScope(
    95→                    state: \.modulePreview,
    96→                    action: \.modulePreview,
    97→                    view: OnboardingFlowModulePreviewView.init
    98→                )
    99→                .scanditNavigationBar()
   100→            case .slowFlowCapture:
   101→                store.optionalScope(
   102→                    state: \.capture,
   103→                    action: \.capture,
   104→                    view: OnboardingFlowCaptureView.init
   105→                )
   106→                .toolbarBackground(.hidden, for: .navigationBar)
   107→            case .slowFlowCaptureReview:
   108→                store.optionalScope(
   109→                    state: \.captureReview,
   110→                    action: \.captureReview,
   111→                    view: OnboardingFlowCaptureReviewView.init
   112→                )
   113→                .scanditNavigationBar()
   114→            default:
   115→                EmptyView()
   116→            }
   117→        }
   118→        .scanditNavigationBar(title: L10n.Svm.OnboardingFlow.List.title)
   119→        .scanditNavigationBar()
   120→        .toolbar(.hidden, for: .tabBar)
   121→    }
   122→}
   123→

1→// Copyright © 2024 Scandit. All rights reserved.
     2→
     3→import ComposableArchitecture
     4→import SwiftUI
     5→
     6→struct MappingModuleListView: View {
     7→    @Bindable
     8→    var store: TCAStoreOf<MappingModuleListFeature>
     9→
    10→#if DEBUG
    11→    @ObserveInjection private var forceRedraw
    12→#endif
    13→
    14→    var body: some View {
    15→        VStack {
    16→            HStack(spacing: 12) {
    17→                Text(store.name)
    18→                    .defaultFont(size: 20, weight: .semibold)
    19→                    .foregroundStyle(Colors.gray90)
    20→                    .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
    21→
    22→                Button {
    23→                    store.send(.onEditAisleNameButtonTapped)
    24→                } label: {
    25→                    Images.editPencil.swiftui
    26→                }
    27→            }
    28→            .padding(.horizontal, 12)
    29→            .padding(.vertical, 23)
    30→
    31→            AisleModuleListView.create()(store.scope(state: \.list, action: \.list))
    32→        }
    33→        .toast(
    34→            $store.toast.sending(\.onToastDismiss),
    35→            config: .init(alignment: .bottom, verticalPadding: 96)
    36→        )
    37→        .scanditNavigationBar(title: L10n.MappingFlow.List.title)
    38→        .sheet(item: $store.scope(state: \.editAisleName, action: \.editAisleName), content: { val in
    39→            MappingModuleListEditAisleNameView(store: val)
    40→                .presentationDetents([.fraction(0.95)])
    41→        })
    42→        .enableInjection()
    43→    }
    44→}
    45→

content.text:
accessibilityIconFor: @escaping (PersistedShelfScanModule, PersistedShelfScanAisle) -> (Image, Color)? = Self.defaultAccessibilityIcon

Możemy tak zrobić, jedynie to, na czym mi bardziej zależy, to że chciałbym mieć możliwość zwrócenia widoku bezpośrednio, a nie tak, jak tu zaproponowałeś: image i color. Oraz ta zmiana ma być tylko dla **mapping mode list view**; resztę zostaw bez zmian.

Nie podoba mi się to bo wolałbym mieć możliwość tworzenia całych row bezpośrednio, niż używania tych static function. Wtedy możemy stworzyć jakiś **Default Module ListRow** oraz na przykład **MappingMode ListRow**.
Zaproponuję nowe nazwy niż "`rowBuilder`". Domyślnie w iOS masz coś bardziej w stylu "content", "row content".

content.content:
1→// Copyright © 2024 Scandit. All rights reserved.
     2→
     3→import ComposableArchitecture
     4→import OSLog
     5→
     6→extension NavigationDestination {
     7→    static let selectedModuleView = Self(name: "SelectedModuleView")
     8→}
     9→
    10→@Reducer
    11→struct AisleModuleListFeature {
    12→    @ObservableState
    13→    struct State: Equatable {
    14→        let aisle: PersistedShelfScanAisle
    15→        var modules: [PersistedShelfScanModule]
    16→        var didAppear = false
    17→        var allowsModuleCreation = true
    18→
    19→        var aisleName: String {
    20→            aisle.name
    21→        }
    22→    }
    23→
    24→    enum Action {
    25→        case onInit
    26→        case onDeinit
    27→
    28→        case onAppear
    29→        case onDisappear
    30→
    31→        case onError(String)
    32→
    33→        case onModuleButtonTapped(module: PersistedShelfScanModule)
    34→        case onAddModuleButtonTapped
    35→
    36→        case createNewModule
    37→        case onModuleCreated(aisle: PersistedShelfScanAisle, module: ShelfScanModule)
    38→        case onModuleSelected(aisle: PersistedShelfScanAisle, module: PersistedShelfScanModule)
    39→
    40→        case subscribeToModules
    41→        case updateModules(modules: [PersistedShelfScanModule], aisleId: Int)
    42→    }
    43→
    44→    @Dependency(\.homeNavigation)
    45→    var navigation
    46→
    47→    @Dependency(\.firebaseAnalytics)
    48→    var analytics
    49→
    50→    @Dependency(\.aisleService)
    51→    var aisleService
    52→
    53→    private enum CancelID { case module, list }
    54→
    55→    @MainActor
    56→    var body: some Reducer<State, Action> {
    57→        Reduce { state, action in
    58→            switch action {
    59→            case .onInit, .onDeinit:
    60→                return .none
    61→            case .onAppear:
    62→                analytics.logMappingFlow(event: .moduleListScreen)
    63→
    64→                if !state.didAppear {
    65→                    state.didAppear = true
    66→                    return .run { send in
    67→                        await send(.onInit)
    68→                    }
    69→                }
    70→                return .send(.subscribeToModules)
    71→            case .onDisappear:
    72→                if !navigation.contains(destination: .aisleModuleListView) {
    73→                    return .run { send in
    74→                        await send(.onDeinit)
    75→                    }.cancellable(id: CancelID.module)
    76→                }
    77→                return .cancel(id: CancelID.module)
    78→            case .subscribeToModules:
    79→                let aisleId = state.aisle.id
    80→                let storeId = state.aisle.store
    81→                return .publisher {
    82→                    aisleService.modulePublisher(storeId: storeId, forAisle: aisleId)
    83→                        .replaceError(with: nil)
    84→                        .compactMap { $0 }
    85→                        .map { Action.updateModules(modules: $0, aisleId: aisleId) }
    86→                }
    87→                .cancellable(id: CancelID.list, cancelInFlight: true)
    88→            case .onModuleButtonTapped(let module):
    89→                let aisle = state.aisle
    90→                return .run { send in
    91→                    await send(.onModuleSelected(aisle: aisle, module: module))
    92→                }
    93→            case .updateModules(let modules, let aisleId):
    94→                guard aisleId == state.aisle.id else {
    95→                    // Ignore updates if from previously selected aisle.
    96→                    return .none
    97→                }
    98→                state.modules = modules
    99→
   100→                return .none
   101→            case .onAddModuleButtonTapped:
   102→                analytics.logMappingFlow(event: .newModuleButton)
   103→
   104→                return .run { send in
   105→                    await send(.createNewModule)
   106→                }.cancellable(id: CancelID.module)
   107→            case .createNewModule:
   108→                let aisle = state.aisle
   109→                return .run { send in
   110→                    // First create the aisle if needed.
   111→                    let persistedAisle = try await aisleService.persist(aisle: .existing(details: aisle))
   112→                    let storeId = persistedAisle.store
   113→
   114→                    let modules = aisleService.modules(forAisle: persistedAisle.id) ?? []
   115→                    let nextModuleNumber = modules.inferNextModuleNumber()
   116→                    let nextModuleOrder = (modules.compactMap(\.order).max() ?? 0) + 1
   117→                    do {
   118→                        let module = try aisleService.addModule(
   119→                            "\(nextModuleNumber)",
   120→                            forAisle: persistedAisle,
   121→                            order: nextModuleOrder,
   122→                            storeId: storeId
   123→                        )
   124→
   125→                        await send(
   126→                            .onModuleCreated(aisle: persistedAisle, module: module)
   127→                        )
   128→                    } catch {
   129→                        Log.general.error("Could not create a module: \(error.description)")
   130→                        await send(.onError(error.description))
   131→                    }
   132→                }
   133→            case .onModuleSelected:
   134→                analytics.logMappingFlow(event: .moduleSelection)
   135→                return .none
   136→            case .onError:
   137→                return .none
   138→            case .onModuleCreated:
   139→                return .none
   140→            }
   141→        }
   142→    }
   143→}
   144→
   145→private extension [ShelfScanModule] {
   146→    func inferNextModuleNumber() -> Int {
   147→        var proposedNumber = count + 1
   148→        while contains(where: { $0.moduleReference == "\(proposedNumber)" }) {
   149→            proposedNumber += 1
   150→        }
   151→        return proposedNumber
   152→    }
   153→}
   154→

    14→    var body: some View {
    15→        VStack {
    16→            HStack(spacing: 12) {
    17→                Text(store.name)
    18→                    .defaultFont(size: 20, weight: .semibold)
    19→                    .foregroundStyle(Colors.gray90)
    20→                    .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
    21→
    22→                Button {
    23→                    store.send(.onEditAisleNameButtonTapped)
    24→                } label: {
    25→                    Images.editPencil.swiftui
    26→                }
    27→            }
    28→            .padding(.horizontal, 12)
    29→            .padding(.vertical, 23)
    30→
    31→            AisleModuleListView(
    32→                store: store.scope(state: \.list, action: \.list),
    33→                rowContent: { module, aisle in
    34→                    MappingAisleModuleListRow(module: module, aisle: aisle)
    35→                }
    36→            )
    37→        }
    38→        .toast(
    39→            $store.toast.sending(\.onToastDismiss),
    40→            config: .init(alignment: .bottom, verticalPadding: 96)
    41→        )
    42→        .scanditNavigationBar(title: L10n.MappingFlow.List.title)
    43→        .sheet(item: $store.scope(state: \.editAisleName, action: \.editAisleName), content: { val in
    44→            MappingModuleListEditAisleNameView(store: val)
    45→                .presentationDetents([.fraction(0.95)])
    46→        })
    47→        .enableInjection()
    48→    }
    49→}
    50→

input.new_string:
case .aisleModuleListView:
                store.optionalScope(
                    state: \.moduleList,
                    action: \.moduleList
                ) { moduleListStore in
                    AisleModuleListView(
                        store: moduleListStore,
                        rowContent: { module, aisle in
                            DefaultAisleModuleListRow(
                                module: module,
                                aisle: aisle,
                                moduleDescriptionFor: { module, aisle in
                                    aisleService
                                        .localUpdateDate(
                                            forModule: ModuleIdentity(
                                                aisle: aisle,
                                                moduleId: module.id,
                                                moduleReference: module.reference
                                            ),
                                            ofSessionTypes: .onboardingFlow
                                        )?
                                        .lastScannedDescription
                                },
                                shouldShowCheckmarkFor: { module, aisle in
                                    @Dependency(\.settingsManager)
                                    var manager

                                    return aisleService
                                        .localUpdateDate(
                                            forModule: ModuleIdentity(
                                                aisle: aisle,
                                                moduleId: module.id,
                                                moduleReference: module.reference
                                            ),
                                            ofSessionTypes: .onboardingFlow
                                        ).flatMap {
                                            $0.timeIntervalSinceNow < manager.checkmarkCompletionOnboardingPeriod
                                        } ?? false
                                }
                            )
                        }
                    )
                }
                .scanditNavigationBar()
